title: 7x7 Cooking - The Art of Cooking in a Small Kitchen (2013)Gooner
description:
7x7 Cooking - The Art of Cooking in a Small Kitchen - 1st Edition (2013).epub Gooner

Publisher: Skyhorse Publishing; 1 edition (August 1, 2013)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1620876884
ISBN-13: 978-1620876886

With three feet of counter space, two pans, and one pot, author Hope Korenstein breaks down how to make satisfying meals no matter the size of your kitchen. A city-dweller herself, Korenstein understands the limitations urban kitchens place upon todayâ€™s chefs: with limited counterspace, no dishwasher, and miniature appliances that make it difficult to prepare complicated recipes. Dining out or ordering food to-go all the time can become expensive; Korenstein helps home cooks reclaim their kitchens with simple recipes that address the need for low-cost, quick and healthy cooking, all while saving space.

7x7 Cooking is broken down into six easy chapters: Salads and Starters, Chicken and Meat, Fish and Seafood, Pasta, Vegetables and Sides, and Foolproof Desserts. Korensteinâ€™s recipes focus on bold flavors and few ingredients so the pantry stays manageableâ€”and so readers avoid spending hours in the kitchen getting dinner together. With quick sautÃ©s, bakes, and broils, readers learn how to prepare easy and satisfying meals that the whole family will love. No space for a grill? Korenstein teaches you how to love your broiler. With a few helpful tips, cooking in a small kitchen has never been easier!
